about.title: About Me
about.description: I’m a Frontend Engineer with 5+ years of experience in web development, currently working at PT Inspigo Inovasi Indonesia. My journey started in full-stack development, but I quickly found my passion in frontend technologies. I specialize in React, Next.js, and modern UI frameworks like Tailwind CSS and ShadCN/UI, focusing on building dynamic, scalable, and accessible user interfaces.

experience.title: Frontend Engineer | PT Inspigo Inovasi Indonesia (2021 - Present)
responsibilities: Built and maintained high-performance web applications using Next.js and React.
Implemented state management solutions (Redux, Zustand, RTK Query) for better UI performance.
Created customizable learning platforms for enterprise clients with dynamic UI adjustments.
Integrated AI-powered features using OpenAI SDK and RAG for personalized learning experiences.
